ratings.question_text: How responsive to student comments was the instructor?
I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Apart from how well the course was taught, how valuable is the course to students with interests similar to yours?
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-10, if you wish
comments: If you are interested in client work, take this class
I would have welcomed the opportunity to review more reading materials. The speakers offered excellent insight about the aspects of sustainability in the private sector.
Consulting project was great. Class was of dubious use.
Question 7.Professor Burke has done a wonderful job to provide the basic concept for the course and assist my team in the consulting project.
Real-life project and team evaluation.
You are a consultant, working with a real company on a real problem. Great experience if you are looking for it
I enjoyed the opportunity to gain consulting skills for a client.
Clinical project

The project itself. Work in a team, understand what the client wants and try our best to meet the expectations.The wide variety of guest lectures were extremely useful as well. They have really exposed me to the different opportunities in the CSR and sustainability consulting field.
gain practice experience

narratives.question_text: The things about this course most in need of improvement are:
comments: I can't think of one, actually
Most improvement needs to come from the clinical side of things, and that's specific to my client.
Project itself. Better communications with the clients (with the help of Professor Burke), can boost the value-added for both the clients and the students.

narratives.question_text: What was the availability and quality of help you received of the instructor and TA?
comments: No TA, but we met with the instructor every week and she was accessible over email in between. So, exceptionally high. Her input on our project was valuable as well.

The instructor offered a lot of her time and expertise. She offered at least an hour each week to discuss the project. It was so helpful to brainstorm with her about our work. I really appreciated both her time and expertise. I wish more classes offered the opportunity to interact with instructors one-on-one.
Weekly meetings were very helpful
Professor Burke is helpful along the way.
very helpful

narratives.question_text: Discuss if you wish how this course fits into your overall program.
comments: Perfect class for someone interested inc consulting as a profession, which I am
I am interested in transitioning into a consulting career.
Client was right up my alley
The course has exposed me to the wide variety of opportunities existed in the field of consulting and CSR. I secured a summer internship in the field with things I learned in this class.

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: see above; also was recommended by FES alumni in the field I am interested in
I wanted real life experience working on a consulting project.
Because of the client
Strong interest in consulting. Interest in the project offered.

narratives.question_text: Did it live up to your expectations?
comments: Yes
Yes. It offered the opportunity to interact with a client on sustainability initiatives. I felt that our work was helpful to our client.
Client didn't really have a good grasp about how to use our strengths
Yes.

narratives.question_text: Did you get out of it what you expected?
comments: Yes
Yes.
Yes and no
I could get more out of my projects if we negotiated with our clients better in the beginning of the class, but overall I learned a lot and enjoyed the process.

narratives.question_text: If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: Group work reflects what we'd find in a real-world scenario, so that's an advantage. Disadvantages are the same as with any group, you have to compromise and sometimes help your partners more.
It was very helpful to learn from my colleague. We had a very good dynamic and split up our duties accordingly.
Worked well with my team
Good learning experience from each other. Our evaluations for each other are extremely helpful for self-improvement in the future career.
very helpful. I love how the clinic designs to team up people from different backgrounds

narratives.question_text: For students taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: Learn to communicate (write) consistency and in a straightforward manner. This is not the class/field for long-winded writing
Take advantage of the instructor's expertise.Try to meet your client in person.
Find a good client with a specific project for you. Fill out YOUR OWN workplan.
Plan well in the beginning of the consulting project. Know the expectations of your clients and teammates, and work according to a plan. Always be active and be engaged in the project.
